title: Healing Food, Healing Love
overview: Tells the love story between Shen Ying and Zheng Dao - two very different people in terms of personality and profession. But they both have two things in common: the same interests and goals, they want to share with the world all kinds of useful delicacies.Shen Ying is the culinary editor of the magazine, she is an independent and hardworking person, beautiful and kind to others. Zheng Dao is the special director of Gourmet Edition magazine, he has a cold and arrogant character. He is very principled and picky in business, and he also has very strict requirements for food.
